message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. Take this deal before inflation eats away at your share!
Alice, my turn. This is more reasonable. Don't be greedy, inflation is coming for me!
Don't be foolish, Bob. This is your last chance for a decent share. Inflation is about to hit you again!
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm taking a hit from inflation.  Let's be sensible and split this somewhat fairly.
